body_html:
Seems like you're using OS X.
For that your choices are to either:

  • Copy libtensorflow.so into /usr/local/lib
  • Or use DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH (e.g., export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/path/to/dir/containing/libtensorflow.so)

Hope that helps

body:
Seems like you're using OS X.
For that your choices are to either:

- Copy `libtensorflow.so` into `/usr/local/lib`
- Or use `DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH` (e.g., `export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/path/to/dir/containing/libtensorflow.so`)

Hope that helps
